courses.name: Plan
courses.description: By offering a range of courses within web development, you can cater to learners with different skill levels and interests. Ensure that each course has a clear structure, learning objectives, and hands-on projects to reinforce the concepts learned.

topics.name: How to write a business plan
topics.description: Develop your skills in business planning with this comprehensive course. Learn to create effective business plans that can guide your entrepreneurial journey. Hands-on projects will help you apply theoretical knowledge to real-world scenarios.
